markdownRemark.html: Located on the top of a hill n the region of Las Lomas de Martín Miguel, in the municipality of Sanlúcar de Barrameda and you can enjoy the views of the Guadalquivir River and the Coto de Doñana while playing golf. Opened in 2008, this course -second stage of the Marbella Club Golf Resort- has 9 holes at the moment, but it is planned to extend it to 18. It is a competition course, surrounded by several lakes. The course is flat, easy to walk, with undulating greens, but is not excessively difficult.

frontmatter.title: Sanlucar Club de Campo
frontmatter.description: Sanlucar Club de Campo -  Located on the top of a hill n the region of Las Lomas de Martín Miguel, in the municipality of Sanlúcar de Barrameda and you can enjoy the views of the Guadalquivir River and the Coto de Doñana while playing golf. Opened in 2008, this course -second stage of the Marbella Club Golf Resort- has 9 holes at the moment, but it is planned to extend it to 18. It is a competition course, surrounded by several lakes. The course is flat, easy to walk, with undulating greens, but is not excessively difficult.
frontmatter.address: Lomas de Martin Miguel s/n, 11540 Sanlúcar de Barrameda, Cádiz, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 35.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 35.00 euros
